title: Sealegs
description: Led the design and construction of an autonomous system for a small, unmanned surface vehicle (USV).
what: Design and Prototype a small autonomous USV platform for testing and development.
Develop a custom solar power system to extend the operating time of the USV.
how: Performed comprehensive testing in both lab and field environments to verify system performance.
Used Ansys CFX and Autodesk Inventor for custom keel modelling and fluid performance analysis.
result: Successfully extended the operating time of the USV by 20 hours.
Achieved 20% efficiency improvements based on analytical findings.
